readable.title: 3267644370_f2728d6c7a
readable.content: a person snowboarding on a refrigerator A refrigerator is stuck in a bank of snow , and a man is skiing on it . A skier is using a refrigerator as a ramp . A skier goes up a refrigerator in a snowbank . A skier on the side of a refrigerator that 's in a snowbank with the sun in the background .
